It is a legal Human right and right of any child to have their grandparents stay with them as a ground to continous culture and continous bonding with their elder grand parents.

attributes.background:
Changes in Immigration Law to provide automatic stay to any Grand Parent over the age of 65 no matter their nationality without any financial requirement  and provide settlement visa.

There must be a fair system and no appeal should be required.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

We understand that you would like Grandparents to be given greater rights to stay in the UK, but we aren't sure who exactly this would apply to.

You could start a new petition calling for Grandparents of UK residents with permanent leave to remain to be given the automatic right to remain in the UK if that is something you would like to see happen.
